title: Hello!
welcomeDescription1: JudgeMate is a groundbreaking platform for managing and tracking results in sports competitions.
welcomeDescription2: It's a place where referees, competitors, and fans can actively participate in every stage of the competition.
scorecardsDescription: Referees can easily input and modify scores in real-time.
scheduleManagementDescription: Integrated competition calendar for better organization.
aboutDescription1: JudgeMate is a groundbreaking platform for managing and tracking results in sports competitions, initially focused on extreme sports.
aboutDescription2: It's a place where referees, competitors, and fans can actively participate in every stage of the competition.
aboutDescription3: The app introduces a new level of interactivity and community.
supportDescription1: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you resolve any issues and answer questions. We are ready to help in every aspect related to the JudgeMate app.
activationEmailSent: An activation link has been sent to the email provided during registration. Activate the account by clicking the link
haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
